CustomField.description: Number of days prior to the Batch job run date (i.e Enter "2" to consider selecting all invoices generated from past 2 days if the batch job is running today)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of days prior to the Batch job run date (i.e Enter "2" to consider selecting all invoices generated from past 2 days if the batch job is running today)
CustomField.label: Invoice Email Delivery Period
